trigger.title: Trigger: Entity Killed Player
trigger.description: Triggers after a living entity kills a player.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

anyOf.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The checks are applied to the entity that kills the player, with the origin being the position of the player that would get the advancement.
Checks the entity that was the source of the damage that killed the player (for example: The skeleton that shot the arrow)

killing_blow.title: Killing Blow
killing_blow.description: Checks the type of damage that killed the player.
